name: 3秒ばなな
description:
This is Banana!

Have you ever heard of the 3-second rule? There is a rather convenient rule in Japan that says that if you drop food, you can eat it within 3 seconds.
In this game, a banana ventures to the dining table to be placed on the plate of the dining table. However, if you touch the floor or a wall for more than 3 seconds, you will not be able to eat it, so try to use a desk or a chair as much as possible to reach the goal while following the 3-second rule.

There are three stages.

*About the multiplayer mode
This is implemented, but the behavior is not stable. Please consider it as a bonus.
Multiplayer rules... You win when you use the "explosion," a unique ability of bananas that everyone knows, to drop your opponent's bananas on the floor and let them rot.

（English is not supported）
